resources.string:
Hope you're doing well. Thank you for showing interest in posting your Ad in our App.

 We need few details of your Ad.

 Please fill the below details and reply to the same email.

 1. EmailID.
 2. How many number of days the Ad should be posted.
 3. How do you want to redirect your Ad? WebPage or Email.
 4. Provide your webpage link if you want to redirect the Ad to your Webpage.
 4. Ad Image. (Please provide a High quality Landscape image)
 5. Will your Ad contain 18+ contents?

 We will respond back to you shortly. 

 Regards,
 Ad team
 Fittify Me
A BMI of under 18.5 indicates that you have an insufficient weight, so you may need to put on some weight. Consult a doctor or with a trainer in the app for advice.
A BMI of 18.5–24.9 indicates that you have healthy weight for your height. By maintaining a healthy weight, you can lower your risk of developing serious health problems.
A BMI of 25–29.9 indicates that you are slightly overweight, so you may need to lose some weight for health reasons. Consult a doctor or with a trainer in the app for advice.
A BMI of over 30 indicates that you have obesity. Your health may be at risk if you do not lose weight. Consult a doctor or with a trainer in the app for advice.
Do you really want to remove the trainee?
Do you want to extend the subscription?
Do you want to remove the subscription?
